scripts.dev: yarn stop && mkdir -p logs && npx pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only phaser-game-watch
scripts.start: yarn stop && mkdir -p logs && npx pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only phaser-game
scripts.debug: yarn stop && mkdir -p logs && npx pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only phaser-game-debug
scripts.stop: npx pm2 stop phaser-game-watch || true && npx pm2 stop phaser-game-debug || true && npx pm2 stop phaser-game || true
scripts.logs: node -e "process.argv.includes('watch') ? require('child_process').execSync('npx pm2 logs', {stdio: 'inherit'}) : require('child_process').execSync('npx pm2 logs --lines 100 --nostream', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.delete: npx pm2 delete phaser-game-watch || true && npx pm2 delete phaser-game-debug || true && npx pm2 delete phaser-game || true
